column3:
Android Studio needs separate data-sharing consent described by
different language referring to Google and its privacy policy.

Merged manually to master. The data on disk and bundled resource name is now vendor-specific, though I retained previous paths and names for JetBrains products for compatibility with already released versions.
Do you need these changes in 2017.x versions?
Not necessarily. I believe the new consents system is in IDEA 2017.3.4 only; that release was merged into Android Studio 3.2 before Canary 3, which also included commit d601c06 on our side.
